titleInfo.title: The status of deconfinement in SU(3) gauge theory

mods.abstract: We assess the reliability of present lattice calculations in SU(3) Yang-Mills theory at finite physical temperature. There are clear deviations from asymptotic scaling, but the ratios of deconfinement temperature, latent heat and string tension are found to remain constant under lattice changes.

originInfo.publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
